    • Method Detail

      • setTimeOutputForGui

        public static void setTimeOutputForGui(java.util.ArrayList<common.TaskObject> taskList)
        Formats a time output for GUI to display, for the entire list of tasks. For events, the following are the permutations for display:
        1. with event within a day, start and end date in the same week as the current week: "from 15:00 to 16:00 on Thursday 24/03"
        2. with event across days, start and end date in the same week as the current week: "from 15:00 on Thursday 24/03 to 16:00 on Friday 25/03"
        3. with event across days, start date in current week, end date in next week: "from 15:00 on Thursday 24/03 to 16:00 on next Friday 01/04"
        4. with events within a day, start and end date in different week from current week: "from 15:00 to 16:00 on 31/03/16"
        5. with events across days, start and end date in different week from current week: "from 15:00 on 31/03/16 to 16:00 on 01/04/16"
        * if start time does not exist, format will be "from -date- to -end time- on date"
        * if both start, end time do not exist, format will be "from -date- to -end date-"
        * if only end time does not exist, format will be "from -start time- on -start date- to -end date-"

        For deadlines, the following are the permutations for display:
        1. deadlines without time in same week: "by Thursday 24/03"
        2. deadlines with time in same week: "by 15:00 on Thursday 24/03"
        3. deadlines without time in different week: "by 31/03/16"
        4. deadlines with time in different week: "by 15:00 on 31/03/16"
        Parameters:
        taskList - contains all the tasks for the user

      • setTaskTimeOutput

        public static void setTaskTimeOutput(common.TaskObject task)
        Common method called by Delete and Edit to set the timeOutput for a task. Method basically contains control statements to determine if it is a deadline or an event, and calls the relevant helper functions to set the timeOutput
        Parameters:
        task - Task whose timeOutput is to be modified

      • setEventTimeOutput

        public static void setEventTimeOutput(common.TaskObject event)
        Helper method to setTimeOutputForGui, but also called individually by methods in Search and Recurring to set the timeOutputString for a specific event without running through the entire task list. Format of timeOutputString identical to those specified in setTimeOutputForGui.
        Parameters:
        event - TaskObject of category "event" whose timeOutputString is to be modified

      • setEventTimeOutput

        public static java.lang.String setEventTimeOutput(java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime,
                                                  java.time.LocalDateTime endDateTime)
        A variant of setEventTimeOutput, for Recurring tasks to display all occurrences in the desired timeOutput format. Only called from searchByIndex in Search.
        Parameters:
        startDateTime - LocalDateTime containing the start date and time of the event
        endDateTime - LocalDateTime containing the end date and time of the event
        Returns:
        String containing the timeOutput for this set of start and end timings

      • setDeadlineTimeOutput

        public static void setDeadlineTimeOutput(common.TaskObject deadline)
        Helper method to setTimeOutputForGui, but also called individually by methods in Search and Recurring to set the timeOutputString for a specific deadline without running through the entire task list. Format of timeOutputString identical to those specified in setTimeOutputForGui.
        Parameters:
        deadline - TaskObject of category "deadline" whose timeOutput is to be set

      • setDeadlineTimeOutput

        public static java.lang.String setDeadlineTimeOutput(java.time.LocalDateTime startDateTime)
        A variant of setDeadlineTimeOutput, for Recurring tasks to display all occurrences in the desired timeOutput format. Only called from searchByIndex in Search.
        Parameters:
        startDateTime - LocalDateTime containing the deadline of this task
        Returns:
        String containing the timeOutput information for this task
